abstract.text: IOService represents an device or OS service in IOKit and DriverKit.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: IOKit provides driver lifecycle management through the IOService APIs.  Drivers and devices are represented as subclasses of IOService.

abstract.text: IOService represents an device or OS service in IOKit and DriverKit.
IOService represents an device or OS service in IOKit and DriverKit.

An input/output service object that represents a device on the USB bus.
An object that represents an interface of a device on the USB bus.
